TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrivateFontCollection extends System.Drawing.Text.FontCollection
Public NotInheritable Class PrivateFontCollection Inherits FontCollection
public ref class PrivateFontCollection sealed : System::Drawing::Text::FontCollection

summary.span: 提供從字型檔案建立的字型系列集合，這些字型檔案是由用戶端應用程式所提供。

span.span: Provides a collection of font families built from font files that are provided by the client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓應用程式安裝到現有的字型，而不需要取代系統版本之字型的私用版本。The class allows applications to install a private version of an existing font without the requirement to replace the system version of the font. 例如，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]可以建立私用版本的新細明體字型除了系統會使用新細明體字型。For example, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] can create a private version of the Arial font in addition to the Arial font that the system uses. 也可以用來安裝作業系統中不存在的字型。 can also be used to install fonts that do not exist in the operating system. 這是暫時的字型安裝，不會影響系統安裝的集合。This is a temporary font install that does not affect the system-installed collection. 若要查看已安裝的集合，使用類別。To see the installed collection, use the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddFontFile(string filename) cil managed

param.name: filename
param.span: 含有要加入字型檔名的 。

span.span: A that contains the file name of the font to add.

summary.span: 從指定的檔案將字型加入這個 。

span.span: Adds a font from the specified file to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 應用程式支援 TrueType 字型，而且具有有限的 OpenType 字型支援。Windows Forms applications support TrueType fonts and have limited support for OpenType fonts. 如果您嘗試使用不支援，例如不支援的 OpenType 字型或點陣圖字型的字型會發生例外狀況。If you try to use a font that is not supported, such as an unsupported OpenType font or a Bitmap font, an exception will occur. 之前的作業系統上不支援[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]。The is not supported on operating systems before [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]. 在之前的作業系統上使用私用字型時[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]，將會取代預設字型，通常 Microsoft Sans Serif。When using a private font on operating systems before [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)], the default font, typically Microsoft Sans Serif, will be substituted.

exception.span: 不支援指定的字型，或是找不到字型檔案。

span.span: The specified font is not supported or the font file cannot be found.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMemoryFont (IntPtr memory, int length);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddMemoryFont(native int memory, int32 length) cil managed
Public Sub AddMemoryFont (memory As IntPtr, length As Integer)
public: void AddMemoryFont(IntPtr memory, int length);

param.name: memory
param.span: 要加入的字型記憶體位址。

span.span: The memory address of the font to add.

param.name: length
param.span: 要加入的字型記憶體長度。

span.span: The memory length of the font to add.

summary.span: 將包含在系統記憶體中的字型加入這個 。

span.span: Adds a font contained in system memory to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用的記憶體字型，必須使用 GDI + 呈現控制項上的文字。To use the memory font, text on a control must be rendered with GDI+. 使用方法，傳遞`true`，若要設定控制項的應用程式，或個別控制項上設定 GDI + 呈現屬性`true`。Use the method, passing `true`, to set GDI+ rendering on the application, or on individual controls by setting the control's property to `true`. 有些控制項不能使用 GDI + 呈現。Some controls cannot be rendered with GDI+.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
